title: Agroecology Practicum
description: Lectures and demonstrations are combined with field applications to give students direct experience and knowledge of sustainable agriculture and horticulture practices and principles. UCSC Farm and Garden are the living laboratories for testing agroecological principles. Emphasis is placed on small-farm systems. May be applied to major only once. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): Previous or concurrent enrollment in ENVS 100 and ENVS 100L, or by permission of instructor.

class_notes: Global Seminar, applications are now closed. To inquire about any late application deadlines, emailgloballearning@ucsc.edu.
